snippet: The success of McCarren Park Pool shows that people crave swimming outdoors in the summer. The city needs to add more outdoor public pools.
abstract: Editorial observes that the popularity of the reopened McCarren Park Pool in Brooklyn underscores the dearth of public outdoor pools available to New York City residents; asserts that New Yorkers need places to cool down in the city's summer heat.
lead_paragraph: The success of McCarren Park Pool shows that people crave swimming outdoors in the summer. The city needs to add more outdoor public pools.

headline.seo: Cooling an Overheated New York City
